channel.description: Recent content in Configs on Project Azar

item.title: Adventures in LSP-sitting
item.description: I’m fairly confident I’ve mentioned that I’m generally incompetent when it comes to the core competencies of a programmer. I am still learning the terminology for concepts I’ve used in the past like language formatting and completion in an IDE, while deploying them in my preferred “IDE” of choice, which is Neovim these days. Perhaps, as I continue this project of learning and writing about learing through this blog, I’ll bother to figure out how to properly use things like nvim-lsp and mason.
